name: Alligator's Sword
desc: ey, dis mighty lissard man can swing his sword so fast, dat it's more dan da speed a sound!
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Alligator's Sword Dragon
desc:
"Baby Dragon" + "Alligator's Sword"
This card can attack your opponent directly if the only face-up monsters they control are EARTH, WATER, or FIRE.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Amazoness Archers
desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack, while you control an "Amazoness" monster: Change all monsters your opponent currently controls to face-up Attack Position (Flip Effects are not activated), they lose 500 ATK, also they must attack this turn, if able.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Amazoness Chain Master
desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can pay 1500 LP; look at your opponent's hand, then add 1 monster from their hand to your hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Amazoness Heirloom
desc: Equip only to an "Amazoness" monster. Once per turn, that monster cannot be destroyed by battle. After damage calculation, if the equipped monster attacks a monster: Destroy the attacked monster.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Amazoness Sage
desc: At the end of the Damage Step, if this card attacked and is still on the field: Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy that target.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Amazoness Swords Woman
desc: Your opponent takes any battle damage you would have taken from battles involving this card instead.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Amazoness Village
desc: All "Amazoness" monsters gain 200 ATK. Once per turn, when an "Amazoness" monster is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Amazoness" monster from your Deck with a Level less than or equal to that "Amazoness" monster in the GY.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Aroma Strategy
desc:
[At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.] 

You may look at the top card of your Deck at any time.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Baby Dragon
desc: Much more than just a child, this dragon is gifted with untapped power.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Battle Ox
desc: A monster with tremendous power, it destroys enemies with a swing of its axe.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Beatdown!
desc:
[If you control a Level 5 or higher monster, you can activate this Skill.]

All monsters you currently control gain 300 ATK for each Level 5 or higher monster you control. At the end of your turn, flip this card over.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Birdface
desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Harpie Lady" from your Deck to your hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
desc: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Burst Stream of Destruction
desc: If you control "Blue-Eyes White Dragon": Destroy all monsters your opponent controls. "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" you control cannot attack the turn you activate this card.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Champion's Vigilance
desc: If you control a Level 7 or higher Normal Monster, when a monster would be Summoned OR a Spell/Trap Card is activated: Negate the Summon or activation, and if you do, destroy that card.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Copycat
desc: If this card is Summoned: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; this card's ATK/DEF become equal to that monster's original ATK/DEF.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Cost Down
desc: Discard 1 card; for the rest of this turn, reduce the Levels of all monsters in your hand by 2 (even after they are Summoned).
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Cyber Shield
desc: Equip only to "Harpie Lady" or "Harpie Lady Sisters". It gains 500 ATK.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Dicephoon
desc:
Roll a six-sided die and apply the result.
● 2, 3, or 4: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field.
● 5: Destroy 2 Spells/Traps on the field.
● 1 or 6: You take 1000 damage.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Dragon Caller
desc:
[Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.] 

Once per Duel, you can use 1 of the following Skills.
• If you successfully Normal Summon “Lord of D.”, add 1 “The Flute of Summoning Dragon” from your Deck or GY to your hand.
• Reveal “The Flute of Summoning Dragon” from your hand, then add 1 “Lord of D.” from your Deck or GY to your hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Dragon's Rebirth
desc: Target 1 Dragon monster you control; banish that target, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Dragon monster from your hand or GY.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Elegant Egotist
desc: If "Harpie Lady" is on the field: Special Summon 1 "Harpie Lady" or "Harpie Lady Sisters" from your hand or Deck.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Flame Manipulator
desc: This Spellcaster attacks enemies with fire-related spells such as "Sea of Flames" and "Wall of Fire".
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Flame Swordsman
desc: "Flame Manipulator" + "Masaki the Legendary Swordsman"
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Flight of the Harpies
desc:
[If you lose 1800 or more LP, you can activate this Skill during your next Draw Phase.]

During your Draw Phase, you may search your Deck for a “Harpie” card, reveal it to your opponent, and add it to your hand instead of drawing. If you do that, flip this card over.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Fusion Gate
desc: While this card is on the field: The turn player can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from their Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from their hand or field.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Gearfried the Iron Knight
desc: If either player equips an Equip Card(s) to this card: Destroy that Equip Card(s).
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Graceful Dice
desc: Roll a six-sided die. All monsters you currently control gain ATK/DEF equal to the result x 100, until the end of this turn.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Grit
desc:
[Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.] 

At the start of your turn, call 2 numbers and roll a six-sided die. If you roll a number you called, your LP do not get lower than 1 until the end of your opponent's next turn. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Harpie Lady 1
desc:
(This card's name is always treated as "Harpie Lady".)
All WIND monsters gain 300 ATK.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Harpie Lady 2
desc:
(This card's name is always treated as "Harpie Lady".)
Negate the effects of Flip monsters this card destroys by battle.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Harpie Lady 3
desc:
(This card's name is always treated as "Harpie Lady".)
An opponent's monster that battles this card cannot declare an attack during your opponent's next 2 turns.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Harpie Lady Sisters
desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned with "Elegant Egotist".
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Harpies' Hunting Ground
desc: All Winged Beast monsters gain 200 ATK/DEF. If any "Harpie Lady" or "Harpie Lady Sisters" is Normal or Special Summoned: The player who conducted the Summon targets 1 Spell/Trap on the field; that player destroys that target.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Interdimensional Matter Transporter
desc: Target 1 face-up monster you control; banish that target until the End Phase.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Kaibaman
desc: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Kunai with Chain
desc:
Activate 1 or both of these effects (simultaneously).
● When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; change that target to Defense Position.
● Target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card to that target. It gains 500 ATK.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Last Gamble
desc:
[At the start of the 5th turn, activate this Skill (count both players' turns).]

During your Main Phase, you can reduce your LP to 100 and discard 2 cards from your hand. Roll a six-sided die and draw cards equal to the result. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Legendary Sword
desc: Equip only to a Warrior monster. It gains 300 ATK/DEF.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Little-Winguard
desc: Once per turn, during your End Phase: You can change the battle position of this card.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Lord of D.
desc: Neither player can target Dragon monsters on the field with card effects.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Luster Dragon #2
desc: This dragon feeds on emerald. Enchanted by this monster even when attacked, few people live to tell of its beauty.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Masaki the Legendary Swordsman
desc: Legendary swordmaster Masaki is a veteran of over 100 battles.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Meteor Dragon
desc: This dragon appeared from the sky and crashed to the earth.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Mountain
desc: All Dragon, Winged Beast, and Thunder monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Pal-O'Mine-zation!
desc:
[Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.] 

During your turn, you may reveal 1 Normal Monster in your hand. This turn, that Monster can substitute for any 1 Fusion Material. If you do, the other Fusion Material(s) must be the correct one(s). 
This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Peak Performance
desc:
[At the start of the Duel, place this card in your Field Spell Zone and flip it over.] 

All Dragon, Winged Beast, and Thunder monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Polymerization
desc: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Red-Eyes Black Dragon
desc: ''A ferocious dragon with a deadly attack.''
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Red-Eyes Spirit
desc: Target 1 "Red-Eyes" monster in your GY; Special Summon it.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Ryu-Kishin Powered
desc: A gargoyle enhanced by the powers of darkness. Very sharp talons make it a worthy opponent.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Shadow of Eyes
desc: When a monster(s) is Set on your opponent's field: Target 1 of those Set monsters; change that Set monster to face-up Attack Position. (Flip Effects are not activated.)
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Skull Dice
desc: Roll a six-sided die. All monsters your opponent currently controls lose ATK/DEF equal to the result x 100, until the end of this turn.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Sogen
desc: All Warrior and Beast-Warrior monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Sonic Shooter
desc: If there are no cards in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone, this card can attack your opponent directly. If it does, the battle damage inflicted to your opponent is the original ATK of this card.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Spirit Ryu
desc: During your Battle Step, if this card battles (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 Dragon monster to the GY; this card gains 1000 ATK/DEF until the end of the Battle Phase.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Stamping Destruction
desc: If you control a Dragon monster: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to its controller.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Stray Lambs
desc: Special Summon 2 "Lamb Tokens" (Beast/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position. You cannot Summon other monsters the turn you activate this card (but you can Set).
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: The Flute of Summoning Dragon
desc: Special Summon up to 2 Dragon monsters from your hand. "Lord of D." must be on the field to activate and to resolve this effect.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Thousand Dragon
desc: "Time Wizard" + "Baby Dragon"
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Time Wizard
desc: Once per turn: You can toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, destroy all monsters your opponent controls. If you call it wrong, destroy as many monsters you control as possible, and if you do, take damage equal to half the total ATK those destroyed monsters had while face-up on the field.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Trap Jammer
desc: When your opponent activates a Trap Card during the Battle Phase: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Triangle Ecstasy Spark
desc: Until the end of this turn, the ATK of all "Harpie Lady Sisters" currently on the field becomes 2700, your opponent cannot activate any Trap Cards, also negate all your opponent's Trap effects on the field.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Tribal Synergy
desc:
[At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.]

If you have an “Amazoness” monster and a “Harpie” monster in your hand, reveal them and draw 1 card.

If you control an “Amazoness” monster and a “Harpie” monster, draw 2 cards.

Each of these Skills can only be used once per Duel.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Twin-Headed Behemoth
desc: During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was destroyed on the field and sent there this turn: You can Special Summon this card, but its ATK/DEF become 1000. You can only use this effect of "Twin-Headed Behemoth" once per Duel.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Tyrant Dragon
desc: During your Battle Phase, if your opponent controls a monster after this card's first attack, this card can make a second attack. Negate any Trap effects that target this card on the field, and if you do, destroy that Trap. This card cannot be Special Summoned from the GY, unless you Tribute 1 Dragon monster.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Wild Tornado
desc: Target 1 face-up card in the Spell & Trap Zone; destroy that face-up card, then, its controller can Set 1 Spell/Trap from their hand. If this Set card is destroyed and sent to the GY: Target 1 face-up card on the field; destroy that target.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

name: Windstorm of Etaqua
desc: Change the battle positions of all face-up monsters your opponent controls.
Set_Name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow
